content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --OCCUR
      operator: equal_to
      value: N
    - name: --STRF
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000240
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When --OCCUR = 'N', --STRF must not be populated
Outcome:
  Message: --STRF is populated when --OCCUR = "N"
  Output Variables:
    - --STRF
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0420
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The characterization of the start of an observation
                  relative to the study reference period. The sponsor-defined reference
                  period is a continuous period of time defined by a discrete starting
                  point and a discrete ending point represented by RFSTDTC and RFENDTC
                  in Demographics.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --STRF
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The characterization of the start of an observation relative to the study reference period. The sponsor-defined reference period is a continuous period of time defined by a discrete starting point and a discrete ending point represented by RFSTDTC and RFENDTC in Demographics.
